summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Sixteenth Avenue South and Seventeenth Avenue South, each from Hanford Street to Spokane Street; Lafayette Avenue, Beacon Avenue, Eighteenth Avenue South and Nineteenth Avenue South, each from Hanford Street to Hinds Street, and Hanford Street, from beacon Avenue to Nineteenth Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle. by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other necessary appurtenances for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1926 OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF SEATTLE, AND PROVIDING FOR THE PAYMENT THEREFOR BY THE MODE OF "PAYMENT BY BONDS," AS PROVIDED BY THE LAWS OF THE STATE OF WASHINGTON AND THE CHARTER AND ORDINANCES OF THE CITY OF SEATTLE
